title: President intervenes to resolve domestic LP gas shortage
body_lines: On the directives of President Gotabaya Rajapaksa, a ship carrying 3,500 metric tonnes of domestic LP gas will dock at Colombo Port tomorrow (May 10), Litro Gas Lanka Limited says.
According to Litro Chairman Mr. Vijitha Herath, necessary arrangements are underway to distribute 15,000 cylinders of domestic LP gas in Colombo and suburbs today and tomorrow.
Subsequently, a total of 80,000 cylinders of domestic LP gas will be distributed island-wide daily starting from Wednesday (May 11).
